title: Changed delay time on logger
description: Weather stations Angelo Meadow & Headquarters had incorrect delay time after powering up sensors for measuring barometric pressure. Delay time was too short at 150 milliseconds.  It is now 1 second. Period affected:  1/5/2010 13:20 to 1/8/2010 14:30 Comments:[1/11/2010 Ginger] Flagged 12,133 datavalues where station is WSAM or WSHQ and LocalDateTime > '2010-01-05 13:20' and LocalDateTime <= '2010-01-08 14:30' incident report migrated from SensorDB.

external_refs.identifier: Passed sanity check; see incident report IR_8
